data.message:
I need to know how to add someone back on Facebook.  It's my brother, Eddie Gilliam from Covington, TN.  I blocked him because he hurt my feelings.  I got over being hurt and tried to add him back and couldn't.  His picture doesn't even come up.  But, he still has me as a friend but can't send me anything.  He's tried added me back as a friend but it does take it!  Please help.  Also, I deleted a friend while I was sleep walking.  Now I cannot add her back.  Her name is Samantha Bingeman and she lives in
Stockton, CA.  We've been friends for 55 years!!!

replies.message: Hi Debbie. To unblock someone, please follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2dd5yDe. Keep in mind, unblocking won't automatically add the person back to your friends list. If you want to become friends with this person again, you'll need to send them a new friend request. -Jessica
